data.title: Minute Birthday Party Ideas (2024)
data.meta_description: Forgot to plan a celebration for someone who's turning another year older? These last-minute birthday party ideas will be a lifesaver!
data.text:
Answered

Birthday party venues on Peerspace typically cost between $50 — $500 per hour.

If you’re running late on planning a celebration for someone who’s turning another year older, these last-minute birthday party ideas are a lifesaver. From fun ideas like hosting a movie night in a private movie theater to doing a glam birthday photoshoot in a professional photo studio, there’s something for everyone no matter their age or interest.

Looking for a fabulous space suitable for all your guests? We’ve got you covered. Just check out Peerspace for hundreds of exciting birthday party venues. You’ll discover dozens of incredible birthday party rental venues near you that are available by the hour and come equipped with excellent features.

And since all venues are owned by locals who want to ensure your party is a success, consult your host with any questions or requests leading up to your event. They may be able to help you score party extras like catering, A/V equipment, and waitstaff. With Peerspace at your side, throwing together a last-minute birthday party is a lot more manageable and practically stress-free.

Now, let’s get back to our favorite last-minute birthday party ideas!

1. Rent an incredible birthday party venue instantly on Peerspace

Short on time and think your last-minute birthday party ideas couldn’t possibly mean booking an incredible venue? Then we’re happy to tell you that you’d be wrong! Peerspace is not only the largest online marketplace for hourly venue rentals, but many venues also offer you instant booking access.

To find an instant book venue for your party, start by heading to our birthday party landing page, entering your location, and clicking search. Once your listing page loads, click on “More Filters” at the top of the page and check off “instant book”.

Now start scrolling listings and find your perfect space! Each listing includes high-def photos, a detailed description provided by the host, upfront pricing, and reviews from past renters. All of this information makes it easy to find and book the perfect space for a last-minute birthday party!

As an example of what’s out there, check out this Williamsburg space with an abundance of natural light in Brooklyn, NY. It offers you the instant book option, and at only $150 per hour, provides you with a large blank canvas space with a prep kitchen, speakers, and a private outdoor patio.

2. Throw together a fun and thoughtful movie night

One of the easiest last-minute birthday party ideas is to simply celebrate your birthday night with the people you’re close with. Invite guests for a birthday night in, watch your favorite movies, and order your favorite food.

You can even book a private movie theater venue using Peerspace!

Here are some of our favorites:

This luxurious mansion in Atlanta, GA (pictured above) with a private screening room that has a mini fridge, 12 plush seats, and Dolby Atmos surround sound.

This cinema mini theater in Sacramento, CA with theater seating for 8, a screen, projector, speakers, and a popcorn machine.

This best-kept secret screening room event space in Brooklyn, NY with red theater seating for 70 guests, a 160″ screen, and a 4k digital projector.

This beautiful movie theater and screening room in Chicago, IL with plush seating for 40 guests, an NEC film projector, surround sound, and an on-site lounge.

This 7,200-square-foot mini-mansion in Houston, TX with a private movie theater that seats 20-25 guests and other amazing mansion features.

Book one of these movie theaters or any of the hundreds of other screening room rentals available on Peerspace. Go all night streaming and talking about your favorite scenes. Perhaps even try and act out scenes with your party guests! Don’t forget to hit record and replay it every year.

You can even plan a night of birthday-themed movies with this list by IMDB as your inspiration. This is one of those perfect last-minute birthday party ideas for people who want to stay in and enjoy the limelight surrounded by loved ones.

3. Surprise them with an old-school sleepover

You can never go wrong with staying up with friends until the sun rises. A fun sleepover would make for a memorable birthday experience. It might also be fun to have a theme, such as the ’80s or Disney princesses to help determine the PJ styles and the movies to watch. Just don’t forget the snacks!

Want to have your last-minute birthday sleepover in an ultra-lux setting? Then check out how and where to rent a mansion for a day!

4. Bake them a personalized birthday cake

If you’re a foodie, then you might want to try baking a cake with your best friends right at home or in a rental kitchen space where you can have access to the best equipment and plenty of space. Go on a quick grocery shopping trip to get the necessary ingredients to bake a cake. Don’t forget to grab your favorite candies, chocolates, sprinkles, or whatever you want to mix or top the cake with.

Remember to check Peerspace for an instant book venue that just happens to have a gorgeous kitchen and dining area. It’s one of the tastier (and most decadent) last-minute birthday party ideas!

One of our favorite suggestions is the kitchen at this beautiful industrial loft in Miami. It offers you instant booking access and an amazing kitchen space to help you whip up and serve a delicious birthday cake. In the words of a Peerspace reviewer who booked this Miami loft: “Place was amazing, was very clean. Location is nice, and convenient. Definitely booking again.”

5. Host a glam birthday photoshoot

Enjoy a glam shoot with everyone in a fabulous outfit and prepped with makeup. It’s not every day you get to put on an amazing outfit, so saying it’s your birthday is the most valid and perfect reason to do so. After snapping photos, tag your friends, and take turns in producing the best photo of your squad. This way, you can keep reliving the moment years after. It’s a beautiful birthday present to yourself, from yourself and the people you’re close with.

You can also take it a step further by booking a professional photoshoot location through Peerspace and asking the host to put you in contact with a reputable photographer. It’s a surefire to make the birthday person feel amazing.

6. Make it a tasty, chill affair with an afternoon merienda

If you’re not familiar with the word, merienda is close to having some afternoon snacks. Host a chill afternoon with some coffee or tea, and maybe some crackers or hotcakes, or what you feel like eating that’s great for sharing.

If you’re the type not to make your birthday a super big deal and just want to have a relaxing afternoon, then this will be your cup of tea. It’s perfect for those with a small circle and who love to just hang around — a simple cake and a day worth remembering!

7. Plan a blowout backyard BBQ birthday party

If you’re taking the day off for your birthday, then it would be a sweet idea to prepare some meat and veggies for a backyard barbecue party! It’s easy if you do it potluck-style and ask each guest to bring a dish. Then provide some cold drinks and catch up with family and friends. It’s a chill way of celebrating — nothing too fancy, just a gathering of great people and good food!

These backyard birthday party ideas for adults can enhance your barbecue, so check them out!

8. Last-minute pool parties are easy to plan with Peerspace

A pool party is one of the best last-minute birthday party ideas, especially if you live in a tropical area or you’re celebrating in the warmer months. Whether you’re planning for a kid or hosting your party, you can never go wrong with setting it up, as long as you have the perfect pool venue.

Luckily, that’s another venue that Peerspace can connect you with! Use our platform to discover and book pool party venues near you. One option is this retro-modern house perfect for small outdoor events in Culver City, CA! It has a lovely heated pool in its manicured Italian-style backyard as well as an outdoor kitchen and patio.

So, what are you waiting for? Send a message to everyone who’s invited to get their swimwear ready.

9. Throw a birthday brunch with the besties

Celebrate your special day with a long table, out on a beautiful sunny day, and some brunch with your favorite people. Plan a menu of breakfast and lunchtime staples. You can host this brunch out in a backyard or on a farm where your view would include gorgeous greenery.

Alternatively, you can rent a restaurant and have all your favorite brunch dishes served to you and your nearest and dearest. Make it easy on yourself by finding and renting a brunch restaurant near you on Peerspace!

10. Keep it simple (and fun!) with a birthday game night

No one is too young or too old for a great game night — even if you’re turning a year older. If you’re not a fan of movies, then maybe a solid game night would be the best option! You can pull out a classic board game, Google new games to play, or even create one!

Consider renting a game room on Peerspace for the perfect mix of style and substance. For instance, this cozy game room in Addison, TX is a fully private space with shuffleboard, a pool table, a TV, and plenty of space to break out the board games. The possibilities are endless, as will the laughs and memories.

11. Make and serve birthday punch

Odds are, you’ll have to go to the grocery store if not other shops to pull off a lot of these last-minute birthday party ideas. One of our favorite ways to utilize your time shopping? Picking up some booze and fresh fruit and making a tasty birthday punch! It’s a smart and efficient way to ensure you have drinks on hand to pass out when the birthday person and other guests arrive.

Follow this scrummy red sangria recipe to make a birthday punch that packs a tasty wallop! It includes red wine, brandy, juice, and sliced fresh fruit. You can also make a no-alcohol punch with an assortment of juices stirred together in a large bowl. Think pomegranate, apple, pineapple, and lime juices for a wholesome, tropical twist. Garnish the punch bowl with flower petals to add the perfect finishing touch.

Peerspace makes last-minute birthday party ideas possible

No matter who you are, where you’re located, or what your budget is, Peerspace can make your last-minute birthday party ideas appear as though you’ve been planning for months! Just pick a venue and enlist the help of your birthday party venue’s host to plan and execute all the extras, like catering, a DJ, a photographer, and whatever else you like.

Any of these ideas can take place at the stunning Peerspace venue of your choice. And let’s be honest: hosting a party at a unique party venue is the perfect finishing touch to planning a last-minute celebration. Especially since it only takes a few minutes to book your dream venue! A minute or two to book and a whole day of experiences to cherish forever.
